pageContext.description: A modern flat hilt with grooves has been braised on. Point also has been tampered with. Grown hollows appear to have been filled in.
pageContext.collection: Public Libraries Museum + Art Gallery,Sunderland,Co. Durham
pageContext.site: England,Co. Durham,from bed of R. Wear at Hylton,near Sunderland
pageContext.toSearch: Hylton Bank, Sunderland, Tyne And Wear Sr4 0ll, UK
pageContext.remarks: Submitted by J. Crowley, Esq. Director (letter 11th May 1952) with letter from Professor J. A. Richmond re: having modern accretions removed. B.M. Lat. advised against this.
